Localization.Name: Wen/Cassel Propulsion
Localization.Description: Subsidiary of RSI, handles a small percentage of their thruster and ship options construction as well as cooling systems.

English.Name: Wen/Cassel Propulsion
English.Description: Subsidiary of RSI, handles a small percentage of their thruster and ship options construction as well as cooling systems.

Localization.Name: Draug
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Wen/Cassel Propulsion
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Draug balances performance, durability, and stealth. Making this large Wen/Cassel cooler ready to respond to any situation you find yourself in.
